name: lusotown-monorepo
description: LusoTown - Portuguese Community Platform - Production Ready Monorepo

scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:web && npm run type-check:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.deploy:mobile: cd mobile-app && npx eas build --platform all
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web-app && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install && cd ../streaming && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf web-app/node_modules && rm -rf mobile-app/node_modules && rm -rf streaming/node_modules
